results.title: [Concurrent long QT and Brugada syndrome in a single patient].
results.text_hl: The ECG at this time showed a prolonged QTc of 500 ms in addition to a typical @<m>DISEASE_Brugada_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D053840 @@@Brugada@@@ pattern. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ was started and after a 36-month follow-up the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ has remained asymptomatic without @DISEASE_212500 @DISEASE_OMIM:212500 @@@arrhythmic events@@@.

citations.NLM: Martínez Sánchez J, García Alberola A, José Sánchez Muñoz J, Pinar Bermúdez E, A Ruipérez Abizanda J, Valdés Chávarri M. [Concurrent long QT and Brugada syndrome in a single patient]. Rev Esp Cardiol. 2001 May;54(5):645-8. PMID: 11412758
citations.BibTeX: @article{11412758, title={[Concurrent long QT and Brugada syndrome in a single patient].}, author={Martínez Sánchez J and García Alberola A and José Sánchez Muñoz J and Pinar Bermúdez E and A Ruipérez Abizanda J and Valdés Chávarri M}, journal={Rev Esp Cardiol}, volume={54}, number={5}, pages={645-8}}

results.title: Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was then referred to the department of cardiology because of @DISEASE_Systolic_Murmurs @DISEASE_MESH:D054160 @@@systolic murmur@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Brugada_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D053840 @@@ECG abnormality@@@, and red cell fragmentation.

citations.NLM: Kubo T, Kitaoka H, Terauchi Y, Tamura S, Okawa M, Yamasaki N, Yabe T, Doi YL. Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy. J Cardiol. 2010 Jan;55(1):125-9. PMID: 20122559
citations.BibTeX: @article{20122559, title={Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy.}, author={Kubo T and Kitaoka H and Terauchi Y and Tamura S and Okawa M and Yamasaki N and Yabe T and Doi YL}, journal={J Cardiol}, volume={55}, number={1}, pages={125-9}}
